title: Base oil SN70
subtitle: Premium yellow base oil for industrial and automotive applications.
description: Our yellow base oil range is formulated to provide exceptional performance in various lubrication applications. Designed to meet high industry standards, it's ideal for hydraulic fluids, gear oils, and process oils.
usesdescription: Ideal for lubrication and hydraulic systems.
Widely used in automotive and industrial sectors.
Excellent thermal and oxidation stability.
